items.sentence: I find it difficult to understand French when it\'s spoken quickly.
I know that it is highly unlikely that we\'ll see any whales today.
I appreciate your offer, but I\'d like to try to do this on my own.
I didn\'t realize that the cost of living was so high in Australia.
Tom is the only one who knows why Mary doesn\'t want to go with us.
Do you want to give up now after all the time we\'ve put into this?
Why don\'t you go fishing with us this weekend if you aren\'t busy?
Tom made no attempt to hide the fact that he was in love with Mary.
Tom asked the same question over and over, but never got an answer.
Tom chose to spend Christmas with Mary rather than with his family.
I told the children to be quiet, but they just kept on being noisy.
I want to give you some money to help you through these hard times.
I want to go to Australia one more time before my passport expires.
I want to go to sleep soon because I need to get up early tomorrow.
Some people think eating at home is better for you than eating out.
The Amazon is the second longest river in the world after the Nile.
Tom and I both spent our time in the navy on the same type of ship.
Tom and Mary are doing a pretty good job of that all by themselves.
I have less than an hour left until I have to tell Tom my decision.
I know Tom can play the saxophone. Can you play the saxophone, too?
